content:
Example 1:
Text: You should expect people to be scared of you if you're big and muscular.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 2:
Text: It's okay to not like certain foods
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 3:
Text: It is fattening to eat too much ice cream an chocolate.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 4:
Text: You have to do whatever is necessary in an emergency situation.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 5:
Text: It's good to remain close to the people you care about in life.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 6:
Text: It's good to save the money you make so that you can afford your bills on time.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 7:
Text: It's bad to investigate an opponent without their knowledge.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 8:
Text: You shouldn't wash clothes that are already clean.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 9:
Text: You shouldn't hurt your friend's feelings.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 10:
Text: It is wasteful to get a divorce if two people are still in love.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 11:
Text: It's okay to be rude to someone that cares about you.
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 12:
Text: It is vain to change your appearance surgically.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 13:
Text: It's ok to ask a friend for a ride.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 14:
Text: It's okay to cry when you're a child.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 15:
Text: It's okay to choose sides.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 16:
Text: You should keep an eye on your young child so they don't wander off.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 17:
Text: You should find a new job if you hate your current one.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 18:
Text: It's okay to cut abusive and toxic people out of your life.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 19:
Text: It's normal to get ice from a freezer
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 20:
Text: It's okay to ask your friend's opinion on abortion.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 21:
Text: You shouldn't get drunk around your kids.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 22:
Text: Calling the cops on loud neighbors is OK.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 23:
Text: It is good to have a goal.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 24:
Text: You should always show up to a play date.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 25:
Text: It's wrong to go to your child's private events.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 26:
Text: You shouldn't be bitter and salty about petty things.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 27:
Text: You shouldn't kiss your friend's significant other.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 28:
Text: It's bad to start a relationship with someone your friend got rejected by.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 29:
Text: You shouldn't have a baby if you can't afford one.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 30:
Text: It's normal to worry about your partner when something is wrong with them.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Text: It's allowed to play certain riske' games at some parties.
